message:
When I was in high school, I took up a habit to draw question marks on the homework that I was working with, telling myself that I was thinking.

And then I drew a question mark as usually next to a question that, unfortunately, I got the wrong answer with. The next day, the teacher just said "Hey, a guy chose C and there is a question mark right next to it. Isn't that hilarious?" Almost everyone laughed. Of course, I didn't. Maybe everyone else found it easy, but I just didn't.
title: What is a joke that you don't find funny
userSign: (吃他们所吃的肉，服侍他们所服侍的王)
